item.title: Meghan Markle’s CV As ‘Struggling Actress’ Resurfaces - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle’s CV As ‘Struggling Actress’ Resurfaces  International Business Times

Meghan Markle’s CV from when she was still a struggling actress has resurfaced online. The document is getting a lot of attention since it also features a stunning headshot of the 37-year-old royal. The one-page document contains information about the Duchess of Sussex’s height, weight, and the color of her hair and eyes. Her television and movie appearances are also listed in it. Markle’s CV reveals that she starred in three theater productions and underwent a series of training for her craft. Some of Markle’s special skills include her fluency in Spanish, her proficiency in French, and he...

item.title: Meghan Markle Musical To Debut - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Musical To Debut  International Business Times

Meghan Markle has retired from show business, but the entertainment industry is more interested in the Duchess of Sussex than ever before. BBC is reportedly planning a radio musical based on her life. “The Sixth In Line To Be King and I” is set to air on BBC Radio 4 on Jan. 1, Hello! reports. The musical won’t go too in-depth. The play will only be 15 minutes long. However, it is expected to look at Meghan’s past as an actress and look ahead to her and Prince Harry’s future, which includes a baby (due in spring). Expect the music to be inspired by Rodgers and Hammerstein. Pippa Evans, Richi...

item.title: Meghan Markle And Prince Harry’s Rumored Baby Name Picks - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle And Prince Harry’s Rumored Baby Name Picks  International Business Times

Meghan Markle and Prince Harry have yet to reveal whether they are having a boy or a girl (or twins, if rumors are to be believed), but they are said to have nailed down potential baby names if their child turns out to be a boy. While the Duke and Duchess of Sussex have yet to settle on one name, Life & Style Magazine reports they have narrowed it down to two royal monikers. “The top contenders are Charles, after Harry’s father, and Arthur,” shared a source. “But nothing’s definite yet.” Arthur was thought to be a strong contender for Prince William and Kate Middleton’s third child ahead of...

item.title: Did Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton Make ‘Powerful Women’ List? - International Business Times
item.description:
Did Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton Make ‘Powerful Women’ List?  International Business Times

Forbes’ annual “World’s 100 Most Powerful Women” list was released earlier this week, but you might be surprised to learn that neither Meghan Markle nor Kate Middleton made the cut. Despite how much attention the two garner from the public on a daily basis, and despite all of the events they attend and the charitable initiatives they’re always working on, Markle and the Duchess of Cambridge’s names are not on the list. They do have a royal relative who made it, though. Out of the 100 women on the listing, Queen Elizabeth II ranks among the top 25 most powerful women of the world. She comes ...

item.title: This Is The Only Luggage Meghan Markle Uses - Forbes
item.description:

London: Prince Harry, Duke of Sussex and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex leave Windsor Castle in Ascot Landau carriage during a procession after getting married at St Georges Chapel A former corporate lawyer, Sonja Salmon had clocked a lot of travel miles. But what she couldn’t understand was why there wasn’t a suitcase on the market that catered to the way she packed and travelled. What she wanted was a stylish carryon with an obvious place to put all the things she always packed and needed – toiletries, shoes, lingerie, jewellery, and of course dirty clothes as the trip progressed. item.title: Serena Williams Urges Meghan Markle To 'Stop Being So Nice' - HuffPost
item.description:
Serena Williams Urges Meghan Markle To 'Stop Being So Nice'  HuffPost

The queen of tennis has told the Duchess of Sussex to ditch the congeniality. Serena Williams said Thursday that her longtime pal, the former Meghan Markle, remains as sweet as ever ― and maybe that should change as she juggles pregnancy and a reportedly tense royal life. “I’m like, ‘How are you?’ and she’s like, ‘No, how are you?’ and I’m like, ‘You’re so sweet, but I’m really asking ― how are YOU?’” Williams told People at an Art Basel event for her clothing line in Miami. “I’m like, ‘Meghan, stop being so nice … you’re the pregnant one, aren’t you supposed to have hormones, why are you s...

Prince Harry and Prince William’s alleged rift reportedly has links to their late mom Princess Diana. This is his way of atoning. He will book absolutely no criticism of Meghan – and he is so sensitive he often sees criticism or...

item.title: Meghan Markle’s Baby May Be Born On Brexit Day - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle’s Baby May Be Born On Brexit Day  International Business Times

Meghan Markle’s baby may be born on Brexit Day, according to bookmakers. After the Duchess of Sussex was spotted in London on Tuesday, royal fans and bookies were quick to notice how much her baby bump has grown. Ladbrokes claimed that the odds on a March baby are now at 4/5. An April baby is evens and a May baby is at 10/1. Jessica Bridge of Ladbrokes told Express, “March 29th could be a huge day for the country in more ways than one. In recent photos of the Duchess, it looks like her bump has ‘popped,’ and punters now reckon the latest addition to the royal family could be a March baby ra...

item.title: Meghan Markle Planning Frogmore Cottage Suite For Mom Doria Ragland - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Planning Frogmore Cottage Suite For Mom Doria Ragland  International Business Times

Meghan Markle is reportedly planning on giving her mom, Doria Ragland, a suite in Frogmore Cottage ahead of her and Prince Harry’s baby’s arrival. A source told Vanity Fair, “Doria wants to be around a lot when the baby arrives, and there are plans for her to have a dedicated space at their new home. She wants to be on hand to help Meghan and Harry with the baby.” The source also said that it is highly likely for Ragland to encourage the Duchess of Sussex to have a home birth. Another source told Grazia magazine that Markle is on board with not having a traditional birth for her firstborn. ...

Prince Harry and Meghan Markle may be keeping a secret. The latest edition of Life & Style Magazine reports the Duchess of Sussex could have more than one royal baby on board. According to the magazine’s Dec. 10 issue, Meghan has been caught calling her baby bump “them.” “Meghan’s hinted numerous times that ‘double trouble’ lies ahead,” an insider said. “She’s seeing a top London consultant who specializes in multiple births and has been spotted affectionally putting her hand on her stomach and saying she can’t wait to meet ‘them.’” The report comes after Irish betting company Paddy Power s...

item.description:
Is Meghan Markle Really Making ‘Diva’ Demands During Pregnancy?  International Business Times

Meghan Markle has been getting a bad rep lately, and a new report claims that the Duchess has been making some very diva-like demands when it comes to how she’ll deliver her first child with Prince Harry. According to Radar Online, the former “Suits” star has become horrified by recent reports that St. Mary’s Hospital, the home of the $10,000 a night Lindo Wing, hasn’t been dubbed as one of the cleanest hospitals in London, scoring a rating of only 2-out-of-5 in a mandatory government cleanliness test, while the health trust running Lindo failed a standards check for cleaning and disposing ...

It was very touching – and shows how much the moment meant to him,” she tweeted. English did not upload the photo with her tweet, but royal fans are aware of the touching...

item.title: Boy so overwhelmed by Queen's visit he immediately crawls out of room - The Independent
item.description:
Boy so overwhelmed by Queen's visit he immediately crawls out of room  The Independent

A little boy was so overwhelmed when meeting the Queen that he dropped to his knees and crawled out of the nearest door. Nine-year-old Nathan Grant was so starstruck upon being introduced to the monarch by his adoptive parents, former Fame Academy judges David and Carrie Grant, that he bolted out of the room, shouting "bye" as he left. Onlookers can be seen laughing in a video captured during the exchange while the Queen visited Coram, the UK's oldest children's charity. Based at the site of The Foundling Hospital in London, Coram has been helping vulnerable children since it gained the Roy...

item.title: Prince Harry Dubbed ‘Funniest Royal’ After Making Jokes - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince Harry Dubbed ‘Funniest Royal’ After Making Jokes  International Business Times

Prince Harry has been dubbed as the funniest royal after he uttered a slew of jokes at musical that he attended by himself. The Duke of Sussex watched “Bat Out of Hell,” which benefitted his charity, the Invictus Foundation. While there, he got up on stage to introduce the show and made everyone laugh. “I’m sure you’re all desperate for the show to start. So, just that. I really want to come on stage and say an enormous thank you to ‘Bat Out of Hell’ for putting tonight on and to all of you for buying tickets and for any of you that didn’t know that this was for the Invictus Foundation, you...

item.title: A Tour Of The Milestone Hotel's New Suite Inspired By Meghan Markle - Forbes
item.description:
A Tour Of The Milestone Hotel's New Suite Inspired By Meghan Markle  Forbes

An exterior view of The Milestone Hotel in London The Milestone Hotel in Kensington has character. And it’s beloved: it’s long been rated number three out of over 1,000 hotels in London. Three Kensington townhouses combined to make one 57-room hotels, from the outside this 1920s building is discreet and unassuming compared to the elaborate interiors revealed once inside. One of 17 hotels in a Red Carnation group, a boutique portfolio of hotels run by Brett Tollman and his wife Bea – they also have property’s in Ireland, South Africa, Switzerland and the United States. Brimming with old-scho...

item.title: No, Kate Middleton Isn't Stealing Outfit Ideas From Meghan Markle - HuffPost
item.description:
No, Kate Middleton Isn't Stealing Outfit Ideas From Meghan Markle  HuffPost

Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge seemingly pulled a page from her sister-in-law’s stylebook and wore a blazer and trousers (gasp!) that look exactly like something Meghan, Duchess of Sussex would wear. And we must say, the look “Suits” her. The former Kate Middleton stepped out alongside her husband, Prince William, on Wednesday for an in honor of Royal Air Force personnel in Cyprus. She wore high-waisted, wide-legged trousers from Jigsaw with a tucked-in white shirt and an olive blazer (appropriately called the “Duchess wool blazer”) from Smyth, according to Go Fug Yourself, a website devot...

item.title: William, Kate, Meghan, and Harry Are Making Nice, for Now at Least - The Daily Beast
item.description:
William, Kate, Meghan, and Harry Are Making Nice, for Now at Least  The Daily Beast

Photo Illustration by The Daily Beast This week began with another set of challenging headlines for the young royals, as the internet continued to feed on the most compelling royal story in years; reports of a rift at the heart of the royal family, with a feud developing between the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge (William and Kate) and the Duke and Duchess of Sussex (Harry and Meghan). However, midweek, a concerted fightback began, with what appeared to be a deliberate leak from Kensington Palace that not only will both families be at Sandringham, the queen’s estate in Norfolk, for Christmas...

item.title: Prince William Previously ‘Shunned’ Idea Of Marrying Kate Middleton - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince William Previously ‘Shunned’ Idea Of Marrying Kate Middleton  International Business Times

Prince William previously shunned Kate Middleton and the idea of marrying her – or anyone – during one of his interviews. In the book “The Making of a Royal Romance” by Katie Nicholl, it was revealed that the future King once denied any suggestion that he would wed Middleton anytime soon. When he was just 22 years old, he was asked about settling down, and he said, “Look, I’m only 22 for God’s sake. I’m too young to marry at my age. I don’t want to get married until I am at least 28 or maybe 30.” Prince William also thought that Prince Harry would tie the knot before him, but this didn’t ha...

item.title: How the Duchess of Cambridge revolutionised the humble hairband - The Telegraph
item.description:
How the Duchess of Cambridge revolutionised the humble hairband  The Telegraph

Ever since the Duchess of Cambridge stepped up to her Royal duties in 2011 she has flown the flag for lavish hair accessories. From bold hats during state services to traditional ornate fascinators at society weddings, she has always taken a regal approach to Royal dressing and accessories. However since returning from maternity leave this autumn, the Duchess has modernised her once quite formal approach to hair accessories and has brought back traditional styles like the headband and pretty grosgrain ribbons in an elegant, modern way. As the suspected tension between the Duchess of Cambri...

item.title: Neo-Nazis 'demand Prince Harry's assassination for marrying Meghan Markle' - The Independent
item.description:
Neo-Nazis 'demand Prince Harry's assassination for marrying Meghan Markle'  The Independent

Counter-terrorism police are investigating the British offshoot of a violent American neo-Nazi group which called for Prince Harry‘s assassination and claimed he is a “race traitor” for marrying Meghan Markle. The group, known as Sonnenkrieg Division, posted a picture of the prince with a gun to his head featuring a swastika and the caption: “See ya later, race traitor!” A BBC investigation obtained hundreds of messages sent by extremists on an online gaming server over several months, including messages sent by senior members of the Atomwaffen Division, an American neo-Nazi group linked to...

item.title: British Neo-Nazis Suggest ‘Race Traitor’ Prince Harry Should Be Assassinated - The Daily Beast
item.description:
British Neo-Nazis Suggest ‘Race Traitor’ Prince Harry Should Be Assassinated  The Daily Beast

Reuters/Phil Noble, A British neo-Nazi group suggested that Prince Harry should be killed for being a “race traitor” after his marriage to American actress Meghan Markle. The group is spreading an image of Prince Harry that includes a gun pointed at his head and a splash of red in the background. A caption reads: “See ya later, race traitor!” Meghan Markel became the first mixed-race woman to join the modern British royal family after she married Harry earlier this year. According to a BBC investigation, the neo-Nazi group identifies itself as the Sonnenkrieg Division, a British offshoot of...

item.title: Meghan Markle debuts new look - The Advertiser
item.description:
Meghan Markle debuts new look  The Advertiser

The Duchess of Sussex, 37, who is expecting her first baby with husband Prince Harry, sported a noticably shorter haircut when she visited Kings College. Her usually long chocolate brown locks appeared to have been trimmed, now sitting just below her shoulders. It’s hardly a dramatic new ‘do for the Duchess ... but it is a departure from the long, Hollywood-style haircut we’re used to seeing her in. The former Suits star joined university leaders, academics and students to discuss how to “build a better world” through higher education with the Association of Commonwealth Universities. Meant...

item.title: Kate Middleton’s Plans For Meghan Markle’s Baby Shower - International Business Times
item.description:

Meghan Markle’s sister-in-law Kate Middleton is reportedly pulling out all the stops for a forthcoming baby shower for the expectant Duchess. Ahead of her spring due date, the Duchess of Cambridge is said to be planning a lavish affair to celebrate Prince Harry and Meghan’s first child. “Kate is planning a no-expenses sparred shower at Buckingham Palace,” an unnamed “friend” told Life & Style Magazine in their Dec. 10 print edition. The “dreamy” event is said to have a blue theme when it comes to dessert. “She’s hired a caterer to make blue cupcakes and a three-course lunch, and has drawn u...

item.title: Meghan Markle discusses gender equality during surprise visit to London university - The Independent
item.description:
Meghan Markle discusses gender equality during surprise visit to London university  The Independent

The Duchess of Sussex has continued to encourage open conversations about gender equality by discussing the subject while making a surprise visit at a London university. On Wednesday 5 December, the duchess ventured to King’s College London for an event held by the Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU). During the visit, the duchess took part in conversations about several topics, including human trafficking, modern slavery, gender equality, peace and climate change. - Read more Meghan Markle reunites with women who inspired Grenfell cookbook Her attendance at the discussions wasn’...

item.title: Meghan Markle’s Nephew Calls Duchess’ Half-Siblings ‘Embarrassment’ For Selling Her Out - International Business Times
item.description:

Meghan Markle’s nephew, Tyler Dooley, has taken the Duchess of Sussex’s side amid her ongoing family feud. While speaking with The Sun, Dooley called Samantha Markle and Thomas Markle Jr. “embarrassment” because they sold out Markle to the papers. “It was never like we had a super tight-knit family before, to be honest. But the fact that now the whole world gets to see how my father or Aunt Samantha behaves, it is like an open wound for everyone else. That’s the hardest part, the fact that there is no privacy. It is hard to deal with. It is embarrassing and sad all at the same time. My fath...

item.title: Meghan Markle Made Sure She Didn’t Repeat Kate’s ‘Curtsy’ Mistake - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Made Sure She Didn’t Repeat Kate’s ‘Curtsy’ Mistake  International Business Times

Meghan Markle reportedly made sure not to repeat the curtsy mistake that Kate Middleton committed during her royal wedding in 2011. In the 2013 Netflix documentary “The Royals,” etiquette expert William Hanson told The Sun that the Duchess of Cambridge forgot to curtsy to Queen Elizabeth II on her wedding day to Prince William. “The bride actually has to curtsy to the Queen when she gets to where the Queen is sitting, and Catherine Middleton forgot to do this when she was walking up the aisle,” he said (via The Sun). Hanson also said that following royal protocols is very important especial...

item.title: This Is When Meghan Markle And Prince Harry Started Trying For A Baby - International Business Times
item.description:
This Is When Meghan Markle And Prince Harry Started Trying For A Baby  International Business Times

Meghan Markle and Prince Harry married in May, but according to a new report, they may have been trying for a baby long before their wedding day. According to Life & Style’s Dec. 10 print issue, the Duchess and Duke of Sussex were planning for their first child before they said their vows in front of family and friends at George's Chapel, Windsor Castle, earlier this year. “She and Harry were trying for a baby even before they walked down the aisle in May,” a source told the tabloid. “Meghan can’t wait to be a mother.” The insider added that the pregnancy has only helped grow the bond betwe...

item.title: Meghan Markle, Prince Harry's Baby Could Face This Tax Nightmare - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle, Prince Harry's Baby Could Face This Tax Nightmare  International Business Times

Meghan Markle and Prince Harry’s baby could face a tax nightmare. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex's firstborn will arrive in 2019. However, the upcoming royal may have to pay U.S. taxes for the rest of his or her life due to an American rule. At the time, Markle is still considered an American citizen since her U.K. citizenship application can take several years. More likely, she’s still an American citizen when she delivers her baby next year. Due to this reason, Markle and Prince Harry may have to pay taxes. The Duke of Sussex’s main source of private wealth is his multi-million trust fund...

item.title: Kate Middleton Channels Meghan Markle In Cyprus - International Business Times
item.description:
Kate Middleton Channels Meghan Markle In Cyprus  International Business Times

Kate Middleton was recently accused of copying Meghan Markle during her recent trip to Cyprus. The Duchess of Cambridge was photographed in her chic and elegant trouser suit, green blazer, a white top, and wide-legged pants. Middleton’s attire looked similar to Markle’s favorite getup. The Duchess of Sussex has been photographed in her pants during multiple occasions since she wed Prince Harry. Royal fans immediately took their thoughts to Twitter after seeing Middleton during Wednesday’s engagement. “Have we ever seen Kate in trousers before? Or is this Meghan rubbing off on her?” one pers...

item.title: This Female Royal Is More Rebellious Than Prince Harry - International Business Times
item.description:
This Female Royal Is More Rebellious Than Prince Harry  International Business Times

Prince Harry is not the most rebellious member of the royal family. In the 2013 Netflix documentary “The Royals,” author Philip Dampier said the Duke of Sussex’s cousin, Zara Phillips, made a scandalous act that drew a lot of attention. Dampier referenced an incident when Philips showed her pierced tongue at Prince Charles’ 50th birthday. Due to the incident, he branded Phillips as “a bit of a royal rebel.” “When she had her tongue stud put in, I think it came on the back of some other publicity she had had prior to that where she had few punch-ups with her then-boyfriend, who was a jockey,...

item.title: Meghan Markle Dubbed ‘Social Climber’ By Piers Morgan - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Dubbed ‘Social Climber’ By Piers Morgan  International Business Times

Meghan Markle has been dubbed a social climber by “Good Morning Britain” host Piers Morgan. In his column for Daily Mail, the 53-year-old said that he was left feeling suspicious and cynical of Markle after she dumped him when someone as influential as Prince Harry entered her life. “And nothing in her behavior since marrying Prince Harry has alleviated those concerns. From the moment I read that he barked ‘What Meghan wants, Meghan gets!’ at palace courtiers in the run-up to the wedding, my heart sank. Because I fear that’s exactly what she’s used to getting. And anyone or anything that ma...

item.title: British Neo-Nazi Group Wants Prince Harry Killed For This Reason - International Business Times
item.description:
British Neo-Nazi Group Wants Prince Harry Killed For This Reason  International Business Times

A British Neo-Nazi group is urging for Prince Harry’s assassination for marrying his mixed-race wife, Meghan Markle. Roy Tingle, a journalist for Daily Mail, claimed that the group wants Prince Harry to be shot for being a race traitor. The Atomwaffen Division was founded in the United States in 2013 with the aim of destroying civilization in order to build a national socialist state. The group has also been linked to five murders. Its UK offshoot is known as the Sonnenkrieg Division and was set up by university student Andrew Dymock. The 21-year-old, who is the son of a dentistry professor...

item.title: Meghan Markle’s Royal Fans Convinced She’s Having Twins - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle’s Royal Fans Convinced She’s Having Twins  International Business Times

Meghan Markle’s fans are convinced that the Duchess of Sussex will be welcoming twins in the spring of 2019. During her recent public outing with Prince Harry, Markle was spotted sporting a huge baby bump. The last time that the Duchess of Sussex was at an engagement, her baby bump didn’t appear to be as big. Following the sighting, royal fans took their thoughts to Twitter and said that it is highly likely for Markle to be carrying twins. “Meghan looks like she’s carrying twins (don’t quote me on that!)” one fan tweeted. “That bump is HUGE. I’m trying not to get my hopes up but these pics ...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra marries Nick Jonas in three-day wedding spectacular in Rajasthan - The Telegraph
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra marries Nick Jonas in three-day wedding spectacular in Rajasthan  The Telegraph

With a barrage of spectacular fireworks lighting up the night sky over Jodhpur, Priyanka Chopra - a close friend of the Duchess of Sussex - married her fiance Nick Jonas on Saturday. The Indian-born actress, 36, and the 26-year-old American musician tied the knot at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Rajasthan, just four months after their engagement. Jonas’s father, Paul Kevin Jonas Sr, a Christian pastor, conducted the ceremony, a culmination of three days of celebrations. The couples guests, who had begun arriving at the palace on Thursday afternoon, were presented with special personalized silv...

item.title: Meghan Markle Shows Off Growing Baby Bump At Charity Event - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Shows Off Growing Baby Bump At Charity Event  International Business Times

Prince Harry and Meghan Markle seemed unfazed when they stepped out for the first time since the Duchess of Sussex was rumored to be feuding with Kate Middleton. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex attended their first charity Christmas Carol Service at St. Luke’s Church in London to support one of Prince Harry’s favorite causes, the Henry van Straubenzee Memorial Fund. The fund helps schools in Uganda and Africa and was named after the prince’s school friend who died in a car accident, according to People. Markle, who is expecting her first child, gave a reading from the poem “Our Deepest Fear”...

item.title: All Of Meghan Markle’s Feuds With Her Own Family - International Business Times
item.description:
All Of Meghan Markle’s Feuds With Her Own Family  International Business Times

Meghan Markle has been rumored to have had her fair share of feuds with her husband Prince Harry’s royal family, but she’s also been at the center of some of her own family feuds. From her dad, Thomas Markle, to her half-sister Samantha Markle, revisit Markle’s biggest feuds with her own blood relatives. After the Duchess of Sussex’s father approved of her marriage to Britain’s Prince Harry, things quickly took a turn in their relationship. Following Meghan’s Christmas with the royals, Prince Harry said his then future wife enjoyed spending time with the “family she never had,” which upset ...

item.title: Squabbling royals, tears, tiaras - The Australian
item.description:
Squabbling royals, tears, tiaras  The Australian

Until recently, the news consisted mainly of squabbling politicians, which isn’t very festive at all. Then the royal family rose magnificently to the occasion. After a year of wonderful headlines — two royal weddings and a royal baby — they seem intent on snatching defeat from the jaws of victory, with a steady drip of toxic gossip flowing out of Kensington Palace. Squabbling duchesses, stroppy princes, tears, tantrums and tiaras, it’s got it all. It’s as if someone in the royal household decided that what the peasants need is a fun distraction and a reminder of just how weird the royals al...

item.title: Meghan Markle Wants New Publicist - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle Wants New Publicist  International Business Times

Meghan Markle might think Hollywood is better equipped to handle the type of attention she is getting. A new report suggests that she wants a publicist from Tinseltown to deal with the all the negative press she has been getting. “Meghan wants to hire a Hollywood publicist,” a source told Radar Online. “She’s losing trust in her advisors and feels they are hanging her out to dry.” The Duchess of Sussex has been dealing with her fair share of rumors. Some say that Prince Harry’s wife is demanding and overbearing while others have said that she and Kate Middleton are feuding. Kensington Palac...

item.title: What Meghan Markle, Michelle Obama Discussed When They First Met - International Business Times
item.description:
What Meghan Markle, Michelle Obama Discussed When They First Met  International Business Times

If you were anywhere near London Monday night, you might have felt a strange-but-wonderful feeling in the air. It was caused by a meeting between two powerful women — Meghan Markle and Michelle Obama — happening in the area. The former First Lady was in town for a tour stop for her new memoir, “Becoming,” and Markle made sure to stop by to finally meet Obama for the first time. “They spoke at length about the importance of supporting and empowering women across all cultures and communities,” a source told Evening Standard. “They also talked about shared experiences of pregnancy and raising ...

item.description:

Queen Elizabeth II won’t be able to stop Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle’s rift. Prince Charles’ royal biographer Tom Bower appeared on "Good Morning Britain" and spoke about the alleged rift involving the Duchess of Cambridge and Duchess of Sussex. According to him, Her Majesty won’t be able to stop the row between Prince William and Prince Harry due to her age. He also blamed Prince Charles for firing the person who could have helped stop the issue. “The problem really is, in the system, that there’s never been in the Palace someone who’s really intelligent, who’s respected. What dressing in separates looks like for brand Black Halo. item.title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, is expecting her first child - CNN
item.description:
Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, is expecting her first child  CNN

Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, is pregnant with her first child, the UK's royal family has announced. A statement from Kensington Palace said the baby is expected in the spring of 2019. Britain's Queen Elizabeth II will be the child's great-grandmother. The Queen and other members of the royal family congratulated Meghan and her husband, Prince Harry, on Friday as they gathered in Windsor for Princess Eugenie's wedding to Jack Brooksbank, a royal source said Monday, without specifying whether the parents-to-be broke the news at their cousin's wedding. The Queen, the Duke of Edinburgh, the P...

item.title: Meghan Markle’s ‘Deal Or No Deal’ Past Revisited - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle’s ‘Deal Or No Deal’ Past Revisited  International Business Times

Before Meghan Markle married Prince Harry and joined the British royal family, before she starred as Rachel Zane on “Suits” and before she became a Hallmark Channel star, she was a “Deal or No Deal” briefcase model. To be exact, she was briefcase model number 24. She was on the game show for over 30 episodes between 2006 and 2007, while the show itself aired new episodes from 2005 to 2009. Now, the show’s making its grand return on Tuesday night on CNBC with Howie Mandel once again as the host. While the series, which originally aired on NBC, won’t have Markle back on as a model — both beca...

Kate Middleton recently gave an update on her youngest child Prince Louis. While at her and Prince William’s tour of RAF Akrotiri in Cyprus, the royal couple visited the base to meet service personnel that will be on duty on Christmas Day. Prince William and Middleton handed out presents from family members that they met at a party that they hosted on Tuesday in Kensington Palace. During the couple’s walkabout outside the Warrant Offices and Sergeants’ Mess, Middleton spoke with 32-year-old Rhian Davis. The mom captured Middleton’s attention after the Duchess of Cambridge saw her carrying h...

item.title: Kate Middleton Insulted Queen During Prince William Royal Wedding? - International Business Times
item.description:
Kate Middleton Insulted Queen During Prince William Royal Wedding?  International Business Times

Kate Middleton missed doing something on her big day that a royal etiquette expert considered insulting to the Queen. In Netflix’s documentary “The Royals,” British etiquette expert noticed how Middleton forgot to curtsy to Queen Elizabeth II on her way to the aisle. “The bride actually has to curtsy to the Queen when she gets to where the Queen is sitting, and Catherine Middleton forgot to do this when she was walking up the aisle,” Henson said. However, Henson said that Middleton managed to save herself. According to him, the Duchess of Cambridge “did do it on the way out.” Henson noted t...

item.title: Royal wedding and Trump visit rack up £9m in policing costs - The Guardian
item.description:
Royal wedding and Trump visit rack up £9m in policing costs  The Guardian

Policing costs for the wedding of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex at Windsor Castle and the visit of Donald Trump cost more than £9.4m, Thames Valley police have said. Prince Harry and Meghan’s wedding in May, which attracted around 110,000 well-wishers, racked up a security bill of £3.4m. The US president’s brief visit in July for afternoon tea with the Queen at Windsor Castle, dinner hosted by Theresa May at Blenheim Palace, Oxfordshire, and a trip to Chequers, Buckinghamshire, cost £6m. Thames Valley police said it had recovered £7.9m for both policing operations from the Home Office. The...

item.title: Prince William, Kate Middleton Attend Diplomatic Reception - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince William, Kate Middleton Attend Diplomatic Reception  International Business Times

Prince William, Kate Middleton, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle attended different events amid royal feud. On Tuesday, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge were in full royal mode when they attended the Queen's Diplomatic Corps Reception at Buckingham Palace. Middleton arrived at the formal gathering in a silver-blue gown designed by Jenny Packham, Harper’s Bazaar reported. The dress featured a draped neckline with sheer cap sleeves. It has clusters of beads of sequins at the torso and at the top of the skirt for a sparkling effect. The royal mom of three matched her glittering outfit with Love...
